Table of Contents

Name

catps, catpgps - catenate postscript files

Synopsis

catps file1 file2 .. fileN

Description

Catenates postscript files. You probably should use the version which was written for specific type of postscript files, e.g. catps, catpgps for PGPLOT based postscript etc.

The pgmerge(1) tool from the psutils package can also merge multiple postscript files, but as their documentation says, they are for a very specific case, it does not merge files in the general case.

See Also

yapp(3NEMO) , layout(1NEMO) , psmerge(1)

History


24-jun-97    added catpgps    PJT
